refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Scales incoming value to user-definable range. Similar to scale object found in popular dataflow languages.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: kscl scale2 kinput, kmin, kmax[, kimin, kimax][ihtime]

refsect1.title: Initialisation
refsect1.para: ihtime -- Optional; Half time value for internal port filter for smoothing. Default is no smoothing.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kin -- Input value. Can originate from any k-rate source and should be in the range kimin to kimax. If it is larger than kimax it is treated as kimax, and if less than kimin then it is treated as kimin.
kmin -- Minimum value of the resultant scale operation.
kmax -- Maximum value of the resultant scale operation.
kimin -- Optional; Minimum of the incoming value range, defaulting to zero.
kimax -- Optional; Maximum of the incoming value range, defaulting to one.

para.warning: The argument order is minimum before maximum, which differs from scale but it consistent with other opcodes that use a range.
